## PatchArrayOp type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PatchArrayOp<T> = [Patch.SET, number, T] | [Patch.INSERT, number, T[]] | [Patch.UPDATE, number, FnO<T, T>, ...any[]] | [Patch.DELETE, number];
```
